mapper.select: SELECT user_id,study_date,study_duration FROM `lt_user_study_details` WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND study_date=#{studyDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE lt_user_study_details SET study_duration = #{studyDuration} WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND study_date=#{studyDate}
